channel.title: Ephiphany Machine
channel.description: Video, music and document releases from AK5A

image.title: Ephiphany Machine
image.description: Video, music and document releases from AK5A

channel.itunes:author: AK5A
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video, music and document releases from AK5A
channel.itunes:summary: Time-lapse, stop-motion, narrative experiments, music, sonic experiments, illustrations, articles and remixed/remastered work from the past - a feed of material from AK5A. For more information and episode notes visit ak5a.com.

item.title: #13 - Warasw
item.description:
<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/86283050?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="720" height="540" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
Created almost by accident for the second issue of Genuine Bricoleur in a white box apartment in Shreveport, LA. Featuring the artwork and staring the late, great Michael Allen Schwalke II. Photography, Music, Editing and Mastering by AK5A. (Originally released February 2007).
item.content:encoded:
<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/86283050?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="720" height="540" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
Created almost by accident for the second issue of Genuine Bricoleur in a white box apartment in Shreveport, LA. Featuring the artwork and staring the late, great Michael Allen Schwalke II. Photography, Music, Editing and Mastering by AK5A. (Originally released February 2007).

item.title: #12 - Man Rides Rockets
item.description:
<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/96879502?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="720" height="405" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
Proud to live in the past of a future I'll never see - bruised and beaming - content to have been at all. Made by AK5A. Media courtesy of Getty Images. Music by Bach. Originally released February 2012.
item.content:encoded:
<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/96879502?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="720" height="405" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.title: #4 - The End of Something Good (Side B)
item.description:
<iframe width="100%" height="600" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/10751618&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true"></iframe>
Originally released January 7, 2009. Side B includes "No, I Can't Be Happy Here", "I've Been Had" and "When I Do, What I Do, When I Do".
